scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -n ossia,partner,relay -c green,cyan,magenta "npm run dev:ossia" "npm run dev:partner" "npm run dev:relay"
scripts.lint:all: npm -w apps/ossiavoice-web run lint && npm -w apps/partner-web run lint && npm -w services/ws-relay run lint
scripts.test:all: npm -w apps/ossiavoice-web run test:unit && npm -w apps/partner-web run test && npm -w services/ws-relay run test
scripts.build:all: npm -w apps/ossiavoice-web run build && npm -w apps/partner-web run build
